note: GDP per capita data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Share of primary-school-age children who are out of school vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Children out of school are the percentage of primary-school-age children who are not enrolled in [primary](#dod:primary-education) or [secondary](#dod:secondary-education) education. GDP data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.

display.name: Share of primary-school-age children who are out of school
